survey_name: Patient Satisfaction with AI-Powered Symptom Checkers Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate patient satisfaction and experience with AI-powered symptom checker tools in healthcare settings, focusing on usability, accuracy, and trust.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use AI-powered symptom checker tools?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use AI-powered symptom checker tools?

questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is not 'Never'
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select. Randomize option order to reduce bias.
